title: Just One Bite: Volume Two
description: Vamps and Weres and Fae, oh my! Throw in some Angels and Demons and Ghosts, add some spicy sex, and you've got the perfect recipe for one hot read. ARe's Just One Bite Anthology Volume 2 brings you the best of paranormal erotic romance from some of your favorite authors.Includes:1. First Time Fang Bang by Victoria Blisse2. Ghost Beside by Kathleen Dienne3. Fangs, Fur, and Fae by Marie Harte4. Secured Heart by Yvette Hines5. Bite Me by Jambrea Jo Jones6. Something Wild by Tracey H. Kitts7. Lilith by Karalynn Lee8. Unforgettable by Amanda McIntyre9. My Soul to Stele by Bethany Michaels10. Wolf Bait by Virginia Nelson11. Charisma by Linda Palmer12. Salute Your Shifter by Dahlia Rose13. Falling by Rosalie Stanton14. The Hungering Wolf by Brenda Williamson
author: Victoria Blisse
